title: Chuckwagon
creator_credit: Robert Barclay, Chetwynd Films and National Film Board of Canada
brief_description: Produced in 1964, this film is a ringside view of the chuckwagon race, star attraction of the world-famous Calgary stampede. Once ponderous Percherons and Clydesdales thundered around the course. Now they are racers, and it takes a firm hand to guide such horsepower. “Chuckwagon” brings to the screen an exciting account of this extraordinary event. (Award: Cragnasco)
creator_credit_for_label: Robert Barclay, Chetwynd Films and National Film Board of Canada
